amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to change pre-election registration deadlines from 30 days to 28 days before election day to ensure the deadline does not fall on a legal public holiday.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Morelle amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Morelle.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Morelle amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
